body_part_breakdown.arms_analysis: Arms showed significant improvement this week, moving from issues like 'Elbow Flare' and 'Rushed Tempo' in earlier sessions to demonstrating 'Controlled Tempo' and proper 'Elbow Tuck' in higher-scoring workouts. This indicates good progress in upper body strength and movement control.
body_part_breakdown.legs_analysis: Legs, specifically ankle stability, have become a recent area of concern. The latest sessions highlight 'Right Ankle Instability' and general 'Ankle Stability' issues, which negatively impacted overall form despite improvements elsewhere. This suggests a need for focused remedial work to build a stable foundation.
body_part_breakdown.core_analysis: Core stability has shown excellent progression. Initially, 'Hip Sag' and 'Core Instability' were primary faults in lower-scoring sessions. Through consistent effort, the core has become a 'Stable Core' and a consistent strength in your highest-scoring workouts, demonstrating effective bracing and midline control.

recommended_plan.expected_benefit: Addresses the recent and recurring 'Ankle Instability' to build a stronger and more stable base for all movements.
Capitalizes on mastered form and controlled tempo to increase strength and progressive overload, building upon consistent high-performance sessions.

best_workout_reason: This session achieved a near-perfect score of 92, demonstrating 'Perfect Depth', a 'Stable Core', and 'Controlled Tempo'. It showed great overall control and alignment, indicating mastery of the movement's fundamentals and readiness for increased challenge.
